German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

From Old High German tiuri, from Proto-Germanic *diurijaz, akin to Old Saxon diuri, compare Dutch duur, English dear, Icelandic dýr, and Swedish dyr.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /tɔʏ̯ɐ/
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -ɔɪ̯ɐ

Adjective[edit]

teuer (comparative teurer, superlative am teuersten)

  1. dear
  2. expensive
